/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urban charm to the scene. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vast expanse. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of history and modernity that characterizes Beijing.
